sentences.sContent: The grandstand was filled with men in seersucker suits, braces and pocket squares.
sentences.sContent_eng: The grandstand was filled with men in seersucker suits, braces and pocket squares.
sentences.sCn: 看台上的男士都身着泡泡纱西服，配着背带和西服袋巾。

sentences.sContent: Kim Fonda said she also saw the plane disrespect toward where she was seated in the grandstand.
sentences.sContent_eng: Kim Fonda said she also saw the plane disrespect toward where she was seated in the grandstand.
sentences.sCn: 肯.芬达说在她坐的看台上，她也看到飞机向她横冲直撞过来

sentences.sContent: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.sContent_eng: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.sCn: 他在白宫前面的看台上检阅了部队。

synos.tran: 正面看台；观众；哗众取宠的表演

trans.tranCn: 正面看台；观众；哗众取宠的表演
trans.tranOther: a large structure that has many rows of seats where people sit and watch sports competitions, games, or races

trans.tranCn: 做博取观众喝采的演技
